授業方法:
This course will be conducted mainly face-to-face, but some of the classes will be conducted online (simultaneous or on demand), depending on the pace of the course. 

General course format: This is NOT a lecture class. Lessons are highly student-centered involving pair work, group work, and presentations. Students are expected to actively contribute to class discussions and respond to other students, including making comments and asking questions. They are also expected to complete their assignments in a timely manner before each class.

トピック.授業計画1: Please note that the weekly schedule above is for information purposes and may change throughout the semester. Any change will be announced to students in due time.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are expected to complete all the tasks assigned each week, in order to prepare for the class activities.

評価.学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
各授業科目は、各学部・研究科の定めるディプロマ・ポリシー（DP）・カリキュラム・ポリシー（CP）に基づき、カリキュラム上に配置されています。
DP・CPを意識して本授業科目の学修を進めることで、各学部・研究科の期待する能力が養成されます。
各学部・研究科のDP、CPや教育課程表（授業科目一覧等）は、下記リンクこちらに掲載していますので学修計画の参考にしてください。
